name: New Majestic Hotel
description:
Property Location
A stay at New Majestic Hotel places you in the heart of Singapore, walking distance from NUS BaBa House and Baba House. This 4-star hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Universal Studios Singapore®.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 30 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars (stocked with some free items) and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.

description:

description:

The hotel features spacious accommodation with a fitness centre, free parking and free Wi-Fi.The RELC International Hotel Singapore extends a number of facilities to the guests like a wide range of accommodation facilities including guest rooms, serviced apartments, meeting rooms and a large auditorium. All the rooms are fully carpeted and air-conditioned, with attached bathrooms and private balconies. The other features of the rooms are in-room safe deposit boxes, mini refrigerator, selected cable TV channels and IDD telephone. This uptown hotel's main priority is to provide the guests with comfort and luxury.
The drive time from Singapore Changi International Airport to the RELC International Hotel Singapore is approximately 25 minutes. You can also take available buses numbered 105, 132 and 190 to reach RELC International Hotel. The central shopping area in Singapore is concentrated on Orchard Road.

name: Holiday Inn Singapore Atrium by IHG
description:
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Enjoy Halal dishes at Atrium Restaurant, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include complimentary wired internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-out. Planning an event in Singapore? This hotel has 18567 square feet (1725 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 13 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 512 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. name: Metropolitan Y
description:
The Metropolitan Y is located at the fringe of Orchard Road shopping belt and the posh district 9 residences. Our hotel is Ideal for visitors seeking a no-frills yet comfortable budget hotel accommodation near Orchard Road, with easy access to the city centre and Chinatown. The nearest MRT is Orchard Station, only 8 minutes away by bustaxi. Complimentary transfers are available, please check with the hotel's reception.Guests will be delighted to enjoy a host of facilities such as our 25m swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant, launderette, business center and free wireless internet broadband access at our lobby , guest rooms and restaurant area. There is free ample car parking just around the hotel and we offer local tours assistance. Our rooms feature in-room cable television programs that will keep you in touched with the world's events and entertainment.
Directions from Changi Airport:If you are driving:- Exit from Changi Airport by Jurong PIE, Go straight all the way till you reach Stevens Rd Exit (12 hr drive along the PIE), Turn into Stevens Rd Exit and drive pass 2 traffic lights, Metropolitan YMCA is just at your left. If you are taking a taxi:- Inform the cab driver to send you to the YMCA at Stevens Road. If you are taking public transport: - Take MRT and alight at Orchard MRT station, Walk out to Orchard Boulevard bus stop on the same side of the road, Take bus 190. The bus will go into Scotts Road, then Stevens Road. Alight at the fourth stop, opposite the Metropolitan YMCA. Public Transport: Bus services along Stevens Rd - 190, 132, 105Bus services along Whitley Rd - 960, 170, 171, 67, 66MRT: Nearest MRT Newton and Orchard MRT

What makes WokeHome different from other hostelsdormitory is the PRIVACY, for EACH OF THE CAPSULES is equipped with 15 inch Flat TV, foldable table, a mini lamp, personal headphone, power socket, air ventilation and roll up shadeblinds. Lockers are available in room to keep valuable belongings. Shower rooms and toilets are available in each of the 3 floors, with hot water, soapsshampoo is provided for free. There is also a seperate washroom area for men and ladies. Guests may enjoy COMPLIMENTARY COFFEETEA all day and night at the lounge area. Others that available for FREE is the 24-hour WIFI access and LAUNDRETTE facilities, equiped with washing machine, dryer, detergentsoftener and ironing facility. Front Desk is open for 24-hour, located on Level 6, easily access via elevator. HOSTEL POLICY: NO CHILDREN under the age of 12. The hostel would not be responsible for any stolen or missing items reported by the guests.
A 5-10 min walking distance from Raffles Place MRT NS26EW14 Clarke Quay MRT NE5 and Chinatown MRT NE4 you would be sure to find your way to our hostel.If you are travelling by bus, Bus Services Available51, 61, 63, 80, 124, 145, 166, 174, 174E, 197, 851, 961The bus stop is located directly at our door step.

name: Grand C
description:
Grand C Hotel is a budget hotel which is located in the Little India area. It is just a 5-minute walking to the famous 24-hour retail mall - Mustafa Centre. It offers rooms with free local calls and Wi-Fi.Located in Kitchener Road, the hotel is just a 5-minute walk to the City Square Mall where Farrer Park MRT Station is located below the mall. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Orchard Road shopping area and a 25-minute drive from Changi International Airport.Grand C Hotel provides the best value for budget conscious travelers without compromising on the quality of stay with superb location. Located in Kitchener Road, the hotel is in the heart of Little India, a popular tourist attraction where tourists can experience the unique culture, scent and sight of the locality. This charming property has long been a favorite in Singapore for both business and leisure travelers. Surrounded by many of the popular shopping malls and food centers, Grand C Hotel is definitely the choice for stay if the guests' priority is convenience and experience. Staff at Grand C's 24-hour reception can assist in ticketing services to nearby attractions. Tour arrangement is available on request.
Grand C Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the culturally rich Little India and the 24-hour retail mall Mustafa Centre.Situated in Kitchener Road, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Farrer Park MRT Station. It is a 10-minute drive from the Orchard Road shopping area and a 25-minute drive from Changi International Airport.

Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless internet access and barbecue grills. The property will be renovating from April 1 2025 to July 1 2025 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected:
  • Elevator

Alternate facilities will be available offsite during the renovation.

Renovation work will only be conducted during business hours. Every effort will be made to minimize noise and disturbance. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 78 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. LED televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

name: Supreme
description:
Located just 20 minutes drive away from the Changi International Airport, Supreme Hotel is rated among the best 3 star hotels in Singapore. The hotel is at a walking distance from the famous Orchard Road, offering easy access to major shopping and entertainment centres of Singapore. Whether you're visiting Singapore for business or pleasure, the Supreme Hotel ensures a comfortable stay at the most affordable rate. The glitz and glamour of Singapore's well known Orchard road is just within the walking distance from Supreme hotel. From the smaller shopping outlets to the shopping complexes and from the banks and cinemas to restaurants and nightclubs, all come with a few minutes walk from the 3star hotel in Singapore. Besides location, the accommodation of Supreme Hotel, Singapore is equally good. The hotel boasts a total of 69 well-appointed rooms, further categorised into standard rooms, superior rooms and family rooms. The rooms have been recently updated keeping in mind the modern day necessities of the guests. All guestrooms are well-furnished and are equipped with most of the modern amenities such as air-conditioning, cable TV, IDD telephone, attached baths, room service and many more. Hotel Supreme offers a host of facilities and services to make your stay in Singapore a comfortable and enjoyable affair. The hotel feautres a well-decorated Coffee House, serving breakfast and light snacks. There is also a dry cleaning and laundry service provided. Safe deposit boxes at the hotel ensure the security of the guests' valuables. The hotel also organizes guided tours of the city on request. Other facilities include 24-hr reception desk, room service, Doctor-on-call (24 hours), Fax facility to mention a few. name: Le Hotel Carpenter Street
description:
The hotel has a total of 22 rooms which are tastefully designed and fitted with modern amenities, providing a comfortable and friendly environment. In addition to a lobby area with 24-hour reception and check-out services, facilities available to guests at the hotel include lift access to all floors and laundry and dry cleaning services (chargeable). Complimentary wireless Internet access is also available in all hotel areas.
Location
The hotel is centrally located in the trendy Boat Quay/Clarke Quay in the city centre. It is within walking distance of the Clarke Quay MRT Station and near a wide variety of eateries and shopping centres, as well as pubs and clubs. It is 10 minutes away from Orchard MRT Station, Singapore's shopping and entertainment hub. Nearby attractions include the Singapore River, Merlion Park and Chinatown. Travelling by car, it takes about 15 minutes to the Singapore Cruise Centre and 25 minutes to Singapore Changi Airport.
Rooms
The hotel offers standard and superior rooms. All are air-conditioned and the in-room facilities include a shower, TV, double bed, complimentary Internet access and tea and coffee making facilities. Ironing facilities and a hairdryer are provided upon request. For single rooms, bathrooms are located beside the rooms with 2 rooms sharing one common bathroom.
Meals
The hotel accepts MasterCard and VISA credit cards payments.
Payment
The hotel accepts Visa and MasterCard.

description:
Property Location

Rooms

Business, Other Amenities
